DataElement.preferredName: Disease Response Evaluation Interval End Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The final date of the period disease response was evaluated, represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Response Domain Disease Response Evaluation Interval End Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain for disease response evaluations._The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression._The period of time during which an evaluation was performed._The calendar date on which something is to terminate or did terminate.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A domain for disease response evaluations.

Concepts.definition: A domain for disease response evaluations.

Concepts.definition: The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 3821155 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
